69 protected:
70  protected:
71  enum ParallelizationMode {
72  Serial, //< only one operation at a time, all blocks of a timestep first, then other timesteps
73  ParallelizeTimesteps, //< up to 'concurrency' operations at a time, but the same block from different timesteps may be scheduled on other ranks
74  ParallelizeTimeAndBlocks, //< up to 'concurrency' operations at a time
75  ParallelizeBlocks, //< up to 'concurrency' operations at a time, all operations for one timestep have finished before operations for another timestep are started
76  };
